q: reading the article, I still do not know, because NEWSWEEK, in my opinion, renders quite an objective review of Donald Rumsfeld 's accomplishments and failings. For example, in the first category-accomplishments: He did succeed in having a major impact on transforming the John McCain military, and even now, some of his 2001 proposals to make the Pentagon more efficient are echoed by Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates . At DoD, Donald Rumsfeld reorganized the command structure, established training for international peacekeepers, and revitalized Special Operations. Washington is in many ways a provincial small town, where everyone knows everyone else's business and the truly interesting parts are off-limits to cameras. Almost all good morsels of gossip are off the record. In written evidence to a parliamentary committee investigating the hacking scandal, Paul McMullan said "everyone in the schoolyard did it" when Andy Coulson worked at The Sun tabloid, before he moved to the News of The World. For what it is worth Andy Coulson knew a lot of people did it at The Sun on his "Bizarre"( showbusiness) column and after that at NOTW, he wrote.
